page.title: 03Housing in Darenth (cont)
page.content:
Also in our area there is a large green by Hillrise. On the green there are play things such as a slide, a roundabout and a rocket.
The village hall is on the corner of Ladywood Road. There are lots of activities held in the village hall like Cubs, bingo for Old Age Pensioners and pre-school playgroup.
The British Legion Hall is on the main road. Here they have jumble sales and bingo.
The 423 bus goes through the village. One way it goes to Dartford and Swanley and the other way it goes to Longfield and New Ash Green.
{ Emma Smith aged 11 {
